title: How has online shopping changed the way you shop? Do you prefer it over traditional shopping?

korean: 온라인 쇼핑 없던 시절이 기억도 안 날 정도야.
예전엔 뭐 사려면 무조건 매장 가야 했잖아.
지금은 집에서 클릭 몇 번이면 다음 날 도착하니까 편해.
새벽에도 쇼핑할 수 있어서 시간 제약이 없는 게 좋아.
가격 비교도 쉽고, 할인 쿠폰 찾아서 쓰면 더 싸게 살 수 있어.
리뷰 보면서 실제 사용 후기 확인할 수 있는 것도 장점이야.
하지만 실물 못 보고 사는 게 단점인 것 같아.
사진이랑 실제가 다를 때 실망스러울 때 있어.
옷이나 신발은 사이즈 때문에 온라인으로 사기 좀 무서워.
그래도 전자제품이나 생필품은 무조건 온라인으로 사.
매장 가서 쇼핑하는 재미도 있지만, 귀찮을 때가 많아.
앞으론 온라인 쇼핑이 더 발전할 것 같아, AR 같은 기술로.
english: I can't even remember the days when there was no online shopping.
In the past, if you wanted to buy something, you had to go to the store, you know.
Now, with a few clicks at home, it arrives the next day, so it's convenient.
You can shop even at dawn, so I like that there are no time constraints.
It's easy to compare prices, and if you find and use discount coupons, you can buy, like, cheaper.
Being able to check actual user reviews while looking at reviews is also an advantage.
But I think not being able to see the actual product is a disadvantage.
When the photo and the actual thing are different, well, it's disappointing sometimes.
For clothes or shoes, I'm a bit scared to buy online because of the size.
Still, for electronics or daily necessities, I definitely buy online.
Shopping at stores is fun too, but, I mean, it's often bothersome.
In the future, online shopping will probably develop more with technology like AR.
